title: Pyke has officially made my perma ban list
body:
I don't even know HOW Riot thought his creation was a good idea. Healing because you don't exist in a fight and being able to EXECUTE ON A RESET FOR EXISTING in a fight. You don't have to land anything. 

Go 0/9/0 but as long as you get a chain on your R you're still in the game it's so freaking stupid


I really don't get why you would get an ASSASSIN HEALING AND CC when they have an execute in their kit one that resets/low cd at that. 

Same goes for someone like Evelynn. Stealth is already horribly balanced in this game right now. 

I'd rather go back to seeing yasuo/ezreal every game than this stupid champ

He has to land the ult. To be fair, it's pretty hard to purposefully dodge it if you don't have Stopwatch or Flash, so I think it could use a tiny bit more delay.

> [{quoted}](name=Trash MammaI,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=mQQulaaY,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-09-12T03:29:12.720+0000)
>
> Go 0/9/0 but as long as you get a chain on your R you're still in the game it's so freaking stupid

Increasing the execute threshold requires items. If he doesn't have AD and Lethality, he'll have a narrower execute window. If he can pull off a chain ult, it stands to reason he'd gain some benefit from it, just like any other champion using a high-impact ult to influence a fight. Is it so different from other ult-bot supports?

> [{quoted}](name=Trash MammaI,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=mQQulaaY,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-09-12T03:29:12.720+0000)
>
> I really don't get why you would get an ASSASSIN HEALING AND CC when they have an execute in their kit one that resets/low cd at that.

Because he's an assassin support. He has less damage than other assassins, and he goes to a lane that'll have two enemies, one or both of which might be ranged. That healing is his defense mechanism from being poked by those enemies. He doesn't have a shield, resistance, or other defensive steroid like other melee supports do.

For the poke part.

Same goes for tank supports. They get poked to death, if both enemy has poking skills. And their self sustain is much lower.

Also his base defenses are just so damn high. Yeah he goes against 2, but he got an ADC too. Right now when i play an all-in tank. It's better to focus ANY adc over Pyke on laning phase. Simply because they die easier.

What i would change:

Reduce early defense, or make self heal lower. Make him vulnerable against something. Right now the only thing you can do is ignore. You can't poke him nor all-in him.

Make Q spend the mana when casting starts. Right now if you interrupt Pyke, then he pays 0 mana for that skill.

Make ultimate into turret style. No extra gold in overall, but gives the killing reward to someone else, if there is anyone who assisted.
